title: WATCH: Premier League goals and highlights from the midweek matches
description: Watch goals and highlights from all the midweek Premier League matches, including Swansea v Arsenal and Huddersfield v Liverpool.
content: Anybody in the UK can view the highlights for free, but you will need to create a free Sky iD - you can do that HERE.Scroll down for highlights from the action so far...Liverpool got back to winning ways on Tuesday evening as they swept past Huddersfield with a 3-0 win in the Premier League.Petr Cech's calamitous error helped Swansea to a shock 3-1 victory over Arsenal as Carlos Carvalhal's side moved out of the Premier League's bottom three.Mark Noble's 50th goal for West Ham earned his side point in a 1-1 draw with Crystal Palace at London Stadium on Tuesday night.
